list.name: Commit
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter

panels.content: **This dashboard has been automatically generated using the dashboard generator of OpenNTI** - It's very easy to personalize it and create your own.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.bytes"), 1s)*8  FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "edges.source_slot", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.source_type", "edges.destination_type" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.packets"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "edges.source_slot", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.source_type", "edges.destination_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.bytes_per_second" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.packets_per_second" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.drop_bytes"), 1s)*8  FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "edges.source_slot", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.source_type", "edges.destination_type" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.drop_packets"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "edges.source_slot", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.source_type", "edges.destination_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.drop_bytes_per_second" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.drop_packets_per_second" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.queue_depth_current" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.queue_depth_peak" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

SELECT "edges.class_stats.transmit_counts.queue_depth_peak" FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "edges.source_type" =~ /^$src_type$/ AND "edges.source_slot" =~ /^$src_slot$/ AND "edges.source_pfe" =~ /^$src_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_pfe" =~ /^$dst_pfe$/ AND "edges.destination_slot" =~ /^$dest_slot$/ AND "edges.destination_type" =~ /^$dst_type$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "device", "edges.destination_pfe", "edges.destination_slot", "edges.destination_type", "edges.source_pfe", "edges.source_slot", "edges.source_type" fill(null)

list.label: src_Type 1:SF 2:LC
list.name: src_type
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WITH KEY = "edges.source_type" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.name: src_slot
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WITH KEY = "edges.source_slot" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.name: dest_slot
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WITH KEY = "edges.destination_slot" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.name: src_pfe
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WITH KEY = "edges.source_pfe" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.name: dst_pfe
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WITH KEY = "edges.destination_pfe" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.label: dst_Type 1:SF 2:LC
list.name: dst_type
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.fabricMessageExt" WITH KEY = "edges.destination_type"  WHERE  "device" =~ /$host_regex/
